backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing salon booking system with user profiles, salon management, services, bookings, reviews, and admin functions with role-based access control using MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (authentication, salon profiles, service management, time slots, bookings, discovery, reviews, admin) to their corresponding files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration with descriptions of their functionality and purpose.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables using neutral tones for backgrounds, foregrounds, borders, and semantic colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Baitoo application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router configuration, route definitions for all pages, authentication guards, loading states, and ProfileSetupModal integration.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button component using Internet Identity with loading states, error handling, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup with form fields for name, phone number, and user type selection (customer or salon owner) with validation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout component that renders a sticky header with logo and login button, main content area, mobile navigation for authenticated users, and a footer with attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileNav: Bottom navigation bar for mobile devices that displays different navigation links based on user type (customer, salon owner, or admin) with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication that manages login state, identity persistence, and provides login/logout functionality using the DFINITY auth client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for data fetching and mutations including user profiles, salons, services, bookings, and reviews with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm earth-toned color scheme for both light and dark modes suitable for a salon booking application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page with tabs for managing salons and users, including permission checks and delete functionality with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/BookingConfirmationPa: Booking confirmation page that displays booking details with salon and service information, and provides navigation buttons to view bookings or browse salons.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Booking form page where customers select a service and time slot to book an appointment at a specific salon, then navigates to confirmation on success.
Displays a customer's list of bookings with details and status badges; includes a dialog for submitting reviews on completed appointments.
frontend/src/pages/SalonBookingsDashboar: Dashboard for salon owners to view all their bookings with customer details and mark pending bookings as completed.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a specific salon including services, reviews with star ratings, contact info, and a button to book appointments.
frontend/src/pages/SalonDiscoveryPage.ts: Lists all available salons in Faizabad with basic info (address, phone, hours) and navigation to individual salon detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/SalonProfilePage.tsx: Form for salon owners to create or update their business profile including name, address, contact number, and opening hours.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceManagementPage: Service management page for salon owners to view, add, and edit services with name and price fields. Includes a dialog component for creating/updating services and displays them in a card list.
frontend/src/pages/TimeSlotManagementPag: Time slot management page for salon owners to add, remove, and save available appointment time slots. Features an input field for adding slots and a list view with remove buttons.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing page that redirects authenticated users based on their role (customer to salons, salon owner to profile) and displays hero banner with feature highlights for unauthenticated visitors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining Baitoo as a salon booking app for Faizabad, India with two user roles (salon owners and customers), architectural notes, and a list of implemented features including authentication, profile management, booking system, and reviews.
